headline: Jim Cramer on Amgen: “Why Not Go Buy That?”
summary: Amgen Inc. (NASDAQ:AMGN) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer mentioned in his latest comments. Cramer highlighted the company’s breakthrough medicine, as he remarked: “We had Amgen on the show the other day, announcing a breakthrough in Repatha, its every other week injection squelches cholesterol to a level where it helps prevent heart attacks. Why […]
